entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Clearing late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
